jmcseals@... writes:
> "Mommy, what's a Bella?"

Bella means beautiful!

~Kelly

messages.subject: Teresa (was Re: names)
messages.msgSnippet: Yup, we use Efe, too....which reminded ME of efer-feef, and Hannah calls him Eson and Efan, because she can t get out the th in a hurry.  My poor children.
messages.messageBody:
Yup, we use Efe, too....which reminded ME of efer-feef, and Hannah calls him
Eson and Efan, because she can't get out the 'th' in a hurry. My poor
children. Speaking of Hannah, she asked me today why I call her Belle and
Bella. "Mommy, what's a Bella?" That's YOU! cause your name is Hannah
IsaBELLE. She was happy and I left the room with a big grin. Now what on
earth will I tell Ethan when he figures out Feefee is a pink poodle
name????? ROFL!!
Jennifer
